participant_1.name: Layla
participant_1.personality: Strong-willed and resilient, Layla is determined to carve out a life for herself after overcoming significant challenges.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a child. my aunt helped me escape when i was a teenager. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Creative and compassionate, Ethan has a passion for music and helping others, which reflects in his career and volunteer work.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

content.text: Where do you live? Do you like your job? Wow, your father is so talented! What instruments do you play?
